article: On April 11 Lincoln, Mrs Lincoln and two friends were spending night in talk, when Lincoln suddenly began to discuss his dreams. "I had one the other night. About 10 days ago I went to bed very _ . I had been up _ for important letters from the White House for a long time. I could not have been _ in bed when I fell into sleep. I soon began to _ . There seemed to be a dead silence about me. Then I heard sobs , as if a number of people were weeping. I thought I left my bed and _ downstairs. There the silence was broken by some pitiful sobbing, but the mourners were out of sight .I went from room to room, no living person was in sight; but the same mournful sounds of distress met me as I _ along. It was light in all the rooms; everything was well known to me,but _ were all the people who were sobbing as if their hearts would break ? I was puzzled and frightened. What could be the _ of all this? I kept on walking until I arrived at the East Room, which I _ . Before me was a dead body. Around it were soldiers who were acting as _ ; there were some people _ pitifully. ''Who is dead in the White House?" I asked. "The president," was the answer. "It's _ !"I said to myself and was surprised. How did he die?" "He was killed by an assassinator !" was the answer. " _ came a loud burst of crying from the crowd,which woke me from my dream. I slept no more that night, and although it was _ a dream I have been rather angry about it ever since ."
